title: Sword of occult; 19 stacks lost with one death
body:
Yesterday I bought a sword of occult {{item:3141}} , but when i was at 2stacks only i sold it. After reaching unstoppable I bought it again but only had 0 stacks, I didn't care much because i thought it works like GA(cd does still exist with rebuy) and i only have the stacks i had befoe, so i would have lost only 2 .
When i picked it up with Fiora {{champion:114}} and was Legendary with 20 stacks, I got shut down by leo{{champion:89}}  and lost NINETEEN stacks with one death. thats 95 ad I lost bc of one death, eventough i should have only lost 10 stacks (45 ad).( lost about 1.5k gold in ad {{item:1038}} ) At first, I tought it was a visiual bug, but after seeing my ad I realized it was no visiual bug and after a kill i had only 3 instead of my 12 I should have had.

It appears to be not every time, because nearly everytime I died,I lost the regular amount of them.



I don't know how you wanna recreate it, except of buying it playing these two champs and see what will happen...

 I hope u fix it soon :)

replies.body:
1. German forum.
2. How often u died after u sold ur Occult ? 

It still counts after u bought it 1 Time. E.g. U sell it on 10 Stacks, losing half on every dead, u die now 2 Times. 10 ( dead ) - 5 stacks - another Dead 2 Stacks.
And if u die more often it will count into the negative one until u are balanced on Kill / Death.

Its not a bug. If u just could sell it if u reach 0 Stacks and rebuy it, to get 5 stacks again, it were a abuse on a Item.
